welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Maynard, a charming city known for its historic downtown, beautiful parks, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Hanscom Field Airport caters to luxury and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is home to several major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is the largest terminal at Logan International Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves primarily international flights and is home to several major airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boire Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Boire Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
